query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity WHERE { ?entityEng a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Place> . ?entityEng owl:sameAs ?entity . FILTER regex( str(?entity), 'it.dbpedia', 'i' ) . } LIMIT 10000

description: Get all spatial things from DBpedia
query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity WHERE { ?entityEng a <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#SpatialThing> . ?entityEng owl:sameAs ?entity . FILTER regex( str(?entity), 'it.dbpedia', 'i' ) . } LIMIT 10000

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity WHERE { ?entityEng a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Event> . ?entityEng owl:sameAs ?entity . FILTER regex( str(?entity), 'it.dbpedia', 'i' ) . } LIMIT 10000

description: Get all yago geo entities from DBpedia
query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity WHERE { ?entityEng a <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/YagoGeoEntity> . ?entityEng owl:sameAs ?entity . FILTER regex( str(?entity), 'it.dbpedia', 'i' ) . } LIMIT 10000

description: Get all yago events from DBpedia
query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity WHERE { ?entityEng a <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/Event100029378> . ?entityEng owl:sameAs ?entity . FILTER regex( str(?entity), 'it.dbpedia', 'i' ) . } LIMIT 10000

description: Get all umbel place from DBpedia
query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity WHERE { ?entityEng a <http://umbel.org/umbel/rc/Place> . ?entityEng owl:sameAs ?entity . FILTER regex( str(?entity), 'it.dbpedia', 'i' ) . } LIMIT 10000
